MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Maes Rhosyn and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.22AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.54AM on 22nd November 2020.
